item.title: How to Contribute to Open Source? (For Beginners)
item.description: Contributing to open source is a great way to learn, teach, and build experience in any skill. First of all you must be familiar with basic Git/GitHub functionalities (i.e. What is commit, repository, fork, branches, merging, merge conflicts, etc). Improve the software you rely on! Improve existing skills. Meet and build a network of people having similar interests as like you. Find mentors or teach others. Build public artifacts to build a reputation and career.
